OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM.synopsis: Orin, Chosen of Bhaal resides in Bhaal Temple, waiting for the players to arrive. She has given them an ultimatum to kill Gortash and retrieve his Netherstone for her, or the players' abducted companion will be sacrified.  If the players didn't have a valid companion for kidnapping, a random citizen will take the place of sacrifice.Orin has multiple reactivity to the player's previous actions.- was Orin attacked during her Impersonations several times?- are players Unholy Assassins?- did/didn't players kill Gortash?- are players DarkUrge?- did Orin kidnap a romance partner, friend or random citizen?- did players kill Sarevok?- was Orin warned of the players coming and therefore kills the victim immediately?Regardless of the various player choices, Orin will eventually begin a fight with the players, determined to prove to Bhaal and herself that she is a worthy Chosen of Bhaal.If players had rejected the Dark Urge earlier, she will turn into the Slayer before combat.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM.how_to_trigger: 0) Start with Dark Urge Origin1) With the debugbook, go to Act 3 -> Undercity -> Bhaal Temple -> Bhaal Temple Bridge.2) oe BTSetKilledGortash for Gortash killed3) oe BTUnholyAssassin for Unholy Assassin title.4) oe BTSetKilledSarevok for Sarevok killed.5) oe BTSetWarnedOrin for Orin was warned. If you set this, as you approach Orin, she will kill the victim first before you can talk to her.6) Go into the Bhaal Temple and trigger conversation with Orin.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_82.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_82.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player approaches, seeing their unconcious companion on the altar. Orin 'transports' herself to the altar, tipping the companion's lolling head as though making them watch the player's approach. She leans over them, confiding. NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking reassurance

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_53.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_53.text: See how it crawls towards us. Not a dream now. No, no. It is blood and bone. Carrying the tyrant's rock.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_53.context: NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking reassurance. 'It' is player. 'Tyrant's rock' is netherstone she asked you to bring.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_48.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_48.text: But Sarevok's crimson was not yours to spill. He was mine. You had no right to take him.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_48.context: NodeContext: A vicious but contained grief - she's genuinely disturbed by his death, but this isn't a feeling she's had before, so she's suppressing it.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_14.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_14.text: I said I'd leave the blood inside. But it smells sweet, and the blade was made to slice...
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin grabs the companion's head again, She draws her daggers, placing the tip of one blade at their exposed throat. A drop of blood trickles down.NodeContext: Fighting temptation to just kill the victim anyway, trying to stress the player out

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_44.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_44.text: Gortash is dead. Gale is not yours to kill.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_38.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_38.text: Gortash is dead. Halsin is not yours to kill.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_68.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_68.text: Gortash is dead. Lae'zel is not yours to kill.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_24.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_24.text: Gortash is dead. Minthara is not yours to kill.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_178.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_178.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Blunt - never really cared about killing the victim

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_113.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_113.text: Gortash is dead. Yenna is not yours to kill.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_173.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_173.text: What have you done to him?

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_72.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_72.text: What have you done to her?

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_83.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_83.text: Nothing! Not a hair out of place. But when we're through, I'll dress your corpse in its skin.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Smug, excited by the thought

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_95.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_95.text: Harm him now, and I will inflict every agony on you tenfold.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_20.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_20.text: Still, it thinks it has control. Flapping its lips, squealing like a lamb on the spit.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin drops the companion's head carelessly, her attention now focused on the player. She prowls around the altar.NodeContext: Exagerrated exasperation - the player using words to threaten her instead of violence is proof of how pathetic they are

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_73.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_73.text: You still don't remember, do you, blood kin?
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_73.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin begins to approach the player, her steps slow and measured. The player watches, wary.NodeContext: Smug, holding power over the player - about to reveal the truth

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_135.speaker: Narrator
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_135.text: How you screamed as my knife slit your skull, your brain juices sticky and sweet.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_135.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] As she walks, Orin transforms into the player, her head turned to one side. As she looks back to the player, we see blood pour down one side of her face,NodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Recalling a pleasing memory

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_138.text: A little hole, big enough for the worm, your body a blood sack to feed it.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_138.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin keeps walking slowly towards the player. She holds out a tadpole on the palm of her hand, and then clenches her fist, crushing the tadpole on the last wordNodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Recalling a pleasing memory. Describing inserting the tadpole into your brain

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_99.text: The favourite of Bhaal turned meat puppet, strung up by the sinews and plucked by my hands.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_99.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin approches, leans in close to the player and speaks the last words softly, before turning back into her normal form.NodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Giggling, proud - Recalling a pleasing memory

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_159.text: How you screamed as my knife slit your skull, your brain juices sticky and sweet.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_159.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] As she walks, Orin transforms into the player, her head turned to one side. As she looks back to the player, we see blood pour down one side of her face,NodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Recalling a pleasing memory

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_13.text: A little hole, big enough for the worm, your body a blood sack to feed it.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_13.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin keeps walking slowly towards the player. She holds out a tadpole on the palm of her hand, and then clenches her fist, crushing the tadpole on the last wordNodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Recalling a pleasing memory. Describing inserting the tadpole into your brain

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_45.text: The favourite of Bhaal turned meat puppet, strung up by the sinews and plucked by my hands.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_45.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin approches, leans in close to the player and speaks the last words softly, before turning back into her normal form.NodeContext:  [Rerecord note] Please ask audio engineer for reference file

Giggling, proud - Recalling a pleasing memory

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_23.speaker: Narrator
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_23.text: *A straggling memory rises: The day your tyranny should have engulfed this world, it was you who were the first to be enslaved.*

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_149.speaker: Narrator
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_149.text: *Orin's smile was the last thing you saw, her bright blade glinting as she chiselled into your skull. Her reckless digging left your mind shattered.*

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_94.speaker: Narrator
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_94.text: *She robbed you of your bloody birthright, reduced you to nothing. Nothing but pure hate, and now it burns, yearning for vengeance.*
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_94.context: CinematicNodeContext: It feels as if the Urge is really surfacing in the player at this point

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_141.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_141.text: Husk. Maggot. A Bhaalspawn, slip-sliding in filth with these pigs. You don't deserve the Murder Lord's blessing.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_141.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Now returned to her own form, Orin speaks very softly in the player's ear. The player adopts a defensive stance, meeting Orin's stare. After a tense moment, she steps back and smiles.NodeContext: 'Husk and maggot' are insults. 'Bhaalspawn' is a good thing to be, that the player is demeaning with their behaviour. Murder Lord's blessing refers to being the slayer/chosen. 'Pigs' refers to the victim/companions/anyone who doesn't worship Bhaal

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_93.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_93.text: That's rich, coming from you. Your grandfather Sarevok is your father, and he ordered your mother to kill you. You come from a cesspit of liars.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_122.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_122.text: No no NO NO NO! He didn't. He didn't... Filthy, pig-mouthed little LIAR!
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_122.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_133.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_133.text: Grandfather loved me. He worshipped me. These petty smearings will not save you.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_133.context: NodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_25.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_25.text: Grandfather loves me. He worships me. How dare you smear his name. It will not save you.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_25.context: NodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_76.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_76.text: You're pathetic. No wonder he tricked you so easily.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_176.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_176.text: Sarevok told me the truth himself. He was laughing at you.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_15.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_15.text: No. Not him. Not him... I did all this for him. Everything... everything...
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_167.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_167.text: No, Orin. You did this for me.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_167.context: CinematicNodeContext: An unseen voice speak out. Orin begins to jerk, her face contorted. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_28.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_28.text: Bhaal... Father, they lie to me. They lie!
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_28.context: NodeContext: reacting to hearing Bhaal's voice in the temple. Almost childlke, she can't handle this

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_96.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_96.text: You hesitate. If you will not fight for my blessing, I will make you something crueller. A deserving sacrifice for my child's ascension.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin looks fearful as her body begins to bend and contort against her will. Bhaal is seizing her form, turning it to his purpose - the ultimate betrayal. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.Turning Orin into the slayer.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_52.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_52.text: Hush, child. No more doubts, no more fears, no more Orin. Become murder.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Above the temple, the eyes of Bhaal's skull glow red. Orin begins to jerk, her face contorted. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.Turning Orin into the slayer.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_172.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_172.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transforms into the slayerNodeContext: Slayer roars

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_103.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_103.text: He's your father, Orin. He abused your mother. He abused you.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_39.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_39.text: Bhaal rejoices in such cruel betrayals. You really believed you were the exception?

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_161.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_161.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_126.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_126.text: Your skin will be grandfather's shroud, coward. I will flay you where you stand.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_146.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_146.text: Your skin will be grandfather's shroud, coward. I will flay you where you stand.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_146.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Energized. Combat about to begin.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_60.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_60.text: Do you plan to duel me with such weakling words? I promise, mine are sharper.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_124.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_124.text: You hold no threat for me. Nor do your petty little vapours.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_124.context: NodeContext: Dismissive, riled up. Getting ready to attack the player

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_145.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_145.text: I deserve it more than you. Sarevok ordered your mother to kill you. You weren't even meant to survive.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_112.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_112.text: That's rich, coming from you. You're the child of a father and his daughter. Your mother was Sarevok's daughter.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_84.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_84.text: Your foul bloodline ends here. You'll rot with your grandfather.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_150.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_150.text: My grandfather ruled this city. A slaughterhouse ripened for my blades, and you stole it.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_150.context: NodeContext: Fury, a personal haterd coming through. 'Grandfather' is Sarevok - this is the claim she thinks makes her superior to you. A stolen birthright.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_169.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_169.text: Enough enough ENOUGH! The runt must be culled.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_169.context: NodeContext: Calming herself down after getting worked up. Knows what she needs to do. 'The runt' refers to the player.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_117.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_117.text: Forget Bhaal. It's your Netherstone I've come for.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_127.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_127.text: None can resist Father's blessing. He tells me, whisper quiet. The lies must be cut from your throat.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_127.context: InternalNodeContext: I like to imagine Orin tried to resist him onceNodeContext: I like to imagine Orin tried to resist him once - disregard if unhelpful. 'Father' is Bhaal. Referring to her hearing Bhaal's voice - real or imagined, we don't know. Finding purpose by the end - knows what needs to be done.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_136.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_136.text: I don't want Bhaal's blessing. I will not fight you for it.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_2.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_2.text: No! The Murder Lord demands one. Only one. It is me. It must be me.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_2.context: NodeContext: Fury - you're not playing by the rules. Refusing to fight means she will never prove herself, never be loved. 'Murder Lord' is Bhaal

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_89.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_89.text: Come close, my Death's Heads, but keep your blades unblooded. Bhaal demands a duel.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_89.context: NodeContext: Commanding, but also getting more worked up/excited. Important info - reiterating the terms of the combat for the player (must be a 1:1 duel)

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_79.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_79.text: He wants to taste my domination. An altar flowing with his own unwilling flesh. Draining, dying, drip, drip, drip.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_79.context: NodeContext: Anticipating. 'He' is Bhaal. 'Own flesh' because the player is a direct descendent of Bhaal.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_9.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_9.text: The changeling stands no chance, fiendish one. Eviscerate her!

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_111.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_111.text: The Murder Lord's blessing will be mine, once I peel the skin from your carcass.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Combat about to begin.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_174.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_174.text: You should have trained harder, Master.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_152.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_152.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transforms into the slayerNodeContext: Slayer roars

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_179.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_179.text: He already made me his Slayer. I will be his Chosen.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_171.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_171.text: It opens its lips and spews filthy lies. No no NO!
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_171.context: NodeContext: Vicious, angry - hates to hear anything referring to the player's relationhsip to Bhaal

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_119.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_119.text: Bhaal has not decided. First our blades must carve and slice. The runt must be culled, the flesh offered.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_119.context: NodeContext: Desperately wants to believe this - Bhaal already gave the player a token of his favour, she's on the back foot. A desperate plan.  'The runt' is the player.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_114.text: Usurper. When I reclaim my rightful place, you'll see the power I hold.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_130.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_130.text: Your rightful place is strung above my altar, carcass fluids flooding into the gutter.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_130.context: NodeContext: lashing out, angry - defiant. 'How dare you.'

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_116.text: Show Orin the splendour of Bhaal's favourite: Call upon the Slayer.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_107.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player transforms into the slayer - a terrifying sight. This is their crowning moment - taking on the form Bhaal gifted them in his very temple.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles. The player-as-slayer ROARS.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player draws their weapon/adopts a fighting stance.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_125.speaker: Narrator
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_125.text: *This is the truth you had forgotten: you were the favourite, the Chosen - Orin was your subordinate.*
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_125.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes, jaw clenched. They remember.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_49.speaker: Narrator
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_49.text: *You led the cultists of Bhaal and orchestrated the Absolute plot. It was your genius, your cruelty, your design.*
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes, jaw clenched. They remember.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_139.speaker: Narrator
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_139.text: *At your moment of greatest triumph - when all the pieces were in place - she betrayed you, infected you, and took your place.*
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_139.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes, jaw clenched. They remember.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_134.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_134.text: Harm her now, and I will inflict every agony on you tenfold.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_35.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_35.text: Kill him. He is nothing to me.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_19.text: Kill her. She is nothing to me.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into the victim's skull, one through each eye. The victim opens their mouth, splutters and dies.  Orin drags her blades free, smiles, and leaps from the altar.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_75.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_75.text: Do you remember now, blood kin?
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_75.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin begins to approach the player, her steps slow and measured. The player watches, wary.NodeContext: Breathless, panting from killing the companion. Smug, holding power over the player - about to reveal the truth

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_131.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into Yenna's skull, one through each eye - we look away, seeing the player's horrified reaction. Orin drags her blades free, giggling.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_8.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_8.text: But you did not listen. Thought my instructions could be ignored. I told you what to do, whelp worm, and you disobeyed.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_54.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Whispered to the comapnion on the altar, but intended for the player. She's been punished for her own disobedience countless times before, and enjoys doling this out to others.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_92.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_92.text: Shh, shh, your saviour approaches, scuttling in without the tyrant's rock.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_92.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player approaches as Orin transports herself to the altar. She whispers to the altar victim, who appears to be lying in a restful sleep, unharmed.NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking disappointment - the player didn't fulfil Orin's ultimatum

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_29.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_29.text: It lied to us. Ignored Father's commands.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_29.context: NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Feigning upset, but you've onlyconfirmed what she already thought - you're unworthy. 'Father' is Bhaal.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_16.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_16.text: You are a mangled blood brain, thinking Father could be refused.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_32.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_32.text: I know what you did. Spilled my grandfather's crimson... He was mine. He showed me the way, how to slice and slit. He guides my daggers still.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_32.context: NodeContext: A vicious but contained grief - she's genuinely disturbed by his death, but this isn't a feeling she's had before, so she's suppressing it.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_105.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_105.text: Did it think it could protect? Did it think it could save? Only the blades can offer salvation.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_105.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking player's intentions. On  the cusp of killing the victim. 'It' is player.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_40.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_40.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? Attacked by your mother on Sarevok's orders. That must have hurt.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_151.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_151.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? Attacked by your mother on Sarevok's orders. That must have hurt.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_123.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_123.text: Like your mother's punishment? That must have hurt, knowing Sarevok ordered her to kill you.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_86.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_86.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_147.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_147.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_31.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_31.text: Like your mother's punishment? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_34.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_34.text: No no NO NO NO! He didn't. He didn't... Filthy, pig-mouthed little LIAR!
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin holds still, her focus now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_5.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_5.text: You think I hurt from such meaningless vapours? Do you forget what I did to you?
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin begins to approach the player, her steps slow and measured. The player watches, wary.NodeContext: Pissed off, but holding power over the player - about to reveal the truth

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_154.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_154.text: Imbecile. I butchered Gortash without breaking a sweat.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_160.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_160.text: You do not smell of his corpse rot. But yes - I feel it. He is grave meat now.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_160.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin closes her eyes, inhales - trying to sense if you speak the truthNodeContext: unbelieving, but then thinking she has some otherworldly sense of his death - delighted

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_65.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_65.text: Liar. LIAR! He still sucks air in his rock-rotten fortress.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_65.context: NodeContext: An angry child, almost a tantrum. Kills victim after this.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_132.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_132.text: You disobeyed the Murder Lord. He will be compensated.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_132.context: NodeContext: Pissed off at you, excited to make the kill

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_12.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_12.text: Harm him, and I will unleash the agonies of Bhaal upon you.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_97.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_97.text: Yes yes, give me agony. Pluck me bone from socket. Stroke me with a jagged edge until my skin shreds wet and red.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_97.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin steps away from the altar, prowls towards the player.NodeContext: Amused/loves the idea the player is going to hurt her. Her blood and pain will only make her more worthy of Bhaal.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_43.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_43.text: Just like Gortash - all air no mettle.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_43.context: NodeContext: Smug - you're exactly as useless as she Kills victim after this, proving her own mettle.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_168.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_168.text: Harm her, and I will unleash the agonies of Bhaal upon you.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_165.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_165.text: You make a meaningless offering. It is my blood you must spill.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_62.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_62.text: You do not lie, underling. It is your blood I am destined to spill. Your death spit will stain these walls, little lamb.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_62.context: NodeContext: Seeing reason, pulling herself back from the kill. Getting excited about the thought of killing the player.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_181.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_181.context: NodeContext: Smug about your poor understanding of Bhaal. Kills victim after this.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_77.text: I did what you asked. I killed Gortash, so let him go.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_143.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_143.text: Yes, yes, but think - you did not prepare yourself. You are no better than this pathetic flesh on my slab.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_170.text: I did what you asked. I killed Gortash, so let her go.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_156.text: Kill him. Only children play with their food.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_3.text: Kill her. Only children play with their food.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_129.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_129.text: So, it comes sneaking and snivelling to Bhaal's sanctum.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_129.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin 'transports' herself to the altar, tipping the companion's lolling head as though making them watch the player's approach. Off-screen, the player repositions to a default position a little way from the altar (out of physical reach)NodeContext:  'It' is player. Caught trying to save victim - Orin finds this pathetic

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_157.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_157.text: Pitiful. Pathetic. Risking its life for a maggot wriggling on the hook.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_157.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin 'transports' herself to the altar, standing over the victim. The player backs away from the altar.NodeContext: Scornful - player freed the victim, but this just proves how weak you are. Maggot is victim on altar. 'It' is player.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_180.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_180.text: Still, I smell the tyrant's rot in the air. You have turned him grave meat at last.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_180.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin turns her attention from from the victim on the altar to the player. She prowls around the altar, towards the playerNodeContext: "No matter - you're here now"

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_70.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_70.text: It thought it could claim my bait meat while the tyrant goes ungored? No no no.
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin turns her attention from from the victim on the altar to the player. She prowls around the altar, towards the playerNodeContext: scolding - "did you really think this would work?". Bait is the victim on the altar. Tyrant is Gortash.  'It' is player.

OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_175.speaker: Orin
OM_OrinDarkUrge_AOM_175.context: CinematicNodeContext: Emote for use in node N816 - 'Orin looks fearful as her body begins to bend and contort against her will. Bhaal is seizing her form, turning it to his purpose - the ultimate betrayal. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.'NodeContext: Emote only. Mixture of pain and shock - this is the ultimate betrayal by the god/Father she worships
